WRITING.TITLE: "Have you ever heard the expression 'Let sleeping dogs lie'? Sometimes you're better off not knowing." -Jake Gittes

WRITING.TEXT: When my grandma says "come" in normal conversation. And like that's a normal word to normal people so I have to hide my gag reflex.
